data.author: Nikolas Dahn
data.message:
- Fixed some bugs and pitfalls when shutting down
- Exceptions during shutdown are now handled properly
- The ROS2 launch service will now exit correctly when asked to shutdown (even if the host process keeps running)
- Fixed a bug in the formatter causing issues with some child process logs
- SIGINT will no longer trigger shutdown multiple times
- Updated ROS2 example
